posts.post_content:
For sale is this 1910 PC796 Christy Mathewson postcard graded SGC 10. The postcard is used and postmarked 1911. A partial postmark was stamped on the front, left border. The card has rounded corners and an upper right corner crease. Cool postcard with a good image. 

$SOLD. Payment via PayPal 'gift' preferred. PM me with questions or to purchase. Thanks............Matt
